March, when the href="http://www.nytimes.com/2010/03/14/technology/14brawl.html?Larry Pagewanted=all" target="_blank"> New York Times reported on the fracturing relationship between Apple and Google, Steve Jobs declined to comment. Eric Schmidt , meanwhile, was anything but cold, calculating, and distant. I continue to believe, as many do, that Steve Jobs is the best CEO in the world today, and I admire Apple and Steve Jobs enormously, Eric Schmidt declared.
